revision.comment: Página creada con «{{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=S-verb_T-dobj |CxnMPDescription=Verb-Object construction |Comments=... escape poverty |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ...»
revision.text: {{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=S-verb_T-dobj |CxnMPDescription=Verb-Object construction |Comments=... escape poverty |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx WHERE { ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence . ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx . ?target rdf:type doc:Word . ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx . ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma . ?source rdf:type doc:Word . ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx . ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma . ?target doc:inSentence ?sent . ?source doc:inSentence ?sent . ?target doc:dobj ?source . ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos . FILTER regex(?spos, "^V") . } }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=S-noun_prep_T-noun |CxnMPDescription=N PP constructions |Comments=avalancha contra pueblos pobres |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slem...»
revision.text: {{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=S-noun_prep_T-noun |CxnMPDescription=N PP constructions |Comments=avalancha contra pueblos pobres |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx WHERE { ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence . ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx . ?target rdf:type doc:Word . ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx . ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma . ?source rdf:type doc:Word . ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx . ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma . ?target doc:inSentence ?sent . ?source doc:inSentence ?sent . ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos . FILTER regex(?spos, "^N") . ?target (doc:hasPOS|doc:hasRPOS) ?tpos . FILTER regex(?tpos, "^N") . ?ofword rdf:type doc:Word . ?ofword doc:inSentence ?sent . ?ofword doc:hasLemma ?oflemma FILTER regex(?oflemma, "(contra|para|a|entre)") . ?ofword (doc:spmod|doc:cc) ?source . ?target doc:objprep ?ofword . } }}

revision.comment: Página creada con «{{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=T-subj_S-verb |CxnMPDescription= Subject-Verb construction |Comments=poverty infects |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?...»
revision.text: {{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=T-subj_S-verb |CxnMPDescription= Subject-Verb construction |Comments=poverty infects |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx WHERE { ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence . ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx . ?target rdf:type doc:Word . ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx . ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma . ?source rdf:type doc:Word . ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx . ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma . ?target doc:inSentence ?sent . ?source doc:inSentence ?sent . { ?target (doc:subj|doc:subjpac) ?source . } UNION { ?source doc:snmod ?target . } ?source (doc:hasPOS|doc:hasRPOS) ?spos . FILTER regex(?spos, "^V") . FILTER (?slemma != "ser") . } }}

FILTER regex(?spos, "^(J|A)") . FILTER regex(?tpos, "^N") . ?source doc:adjmod ?target . } }}

revision.text: {{CxnMP |CxnMPType=sparql |CxnMPGroup=T-subj_es_S-noun |CxnMPDescription=Copular construction |Comments=poverty is a cancer |CxnMPQueryCode=SELECT ?tlemma ?slemma ?sentidx ?tidx ?sidx WHERE { ?sent rdf:type doc:Sentence . ?sent doc:hasIdx ?sentidx . ?target rdf:type doc:Word . ?target doc:inSentence ?sent . ?target doc:hasIdx ?tidx . ?target doc:hasLemma ?tlemma . ?target doc:hasPOS ?tpos . ?source rdf:type doc:Word . ?source doc:inSentence ?sent . ?source doc:hasIdx ?sidx . ?source doc:hasLemma ?slemma . ?source doc:hasPOS ?spos .
